attributes.action: prevent Arriva Trains Wales/Trenau Arriva Cymru Limited from running services in direct competition with The Wrexham, Shropshire & Marylebone Railway Company (trading as Wrexham & Shropshire) into Marylebone station.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see alternatives to Arriva Trains Wales/Trenau Arriva Cymru's proposed plans to run a service from Aberystwyth to London Marylebone in direct competition with The Wrexham, Shropshire & Marylebone Railway Company (Wrexham & Shropshire) as should they be granted this service it would likely force the aforementioned company out of business with immediate effect.
The Wrexham, Shropshire & Marylebone Railway Company has grown into a successful business with a large number of passengers choosing it's services over often faster services provided by either West Coast Trains Limited (trading as Virgin Trains) or London and Birmingham Railway Limited (trading as London Midland). Choosing instead to travel in comfort on reliable British Rail Mark 3 rolling stock with greater comfort levels than could be expected of Arriva Trains Wales/Trenau Arriva Cymru's proposed two-car 158 Diesel Multiple Units.
